Dumping 'red' in different formats:
 - rgb(255, 0, 0)
 - rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)
 - hsl(0, 100%, 50%)
 - hsla(0, 100%, 50%, 1)
 - hsv(0, 100%, 100%)
 - hsva(0, 100%, 100%, 1)
 - #ff0000
 - #f00
 - red
 - default: red
 - inverse color: rgba(0, 255, 255, 1)
 - setAlpha(0.42): rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.42)
